text: Pietro Amenta (born 18 November 1962) is an Italian catholic clergyman and jurist who was a judge of the Vatican's highest appellate court, the Roman Rota, from 2012 to 2018. == References == Category:1962 births Category:21st- century Italian criminals Category:Canon law jurists Category:Italian lawyers Category:Italian legal scholars Category:Italian Roman Catholic priests Category:Living people Category:People convicted of child pornography offenses
title: Pietro Amenta
